title: How come i didn't get a FWotD for 3 days straight........
body: in my other account, i don't have FWotD for 3 days straight.......need help please Riot Games

replies.body: Heya, First win of the day starts at level 15 per our [breakdown guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824).  Now that you're a higher level you will start seeing them daily!
oh....ugh more xp grind i guess smh
